coded_answer.p: My name is Volencia Vardez. I am writing to complain about the services that you are offering duringat the shows at your theatre.
Last May, I had a weekweek's holiday in London, and during my trip I decided to buy tickets for OVER THE RAINBOW, the MUSICAL SHOW. I was really excited withabout the idea of seeing that show.

First of all, when I arrived, I metfound a note stuck on the front door that informed me about changes atto the actor's stafflist of performers. Danny Brook was ill. He was replaced by another actor whose abilities were badpoor.
Secondly, I want to tell you that the show started forty fiveforty-five minutes laterlate.

In orderAs to the tickets, I want to say that they are very expensive. I had put some money aside for athat month, thinking about the discount, but when I wantwent to buy them they said that discounts were not avaibleavailable.
To sum upconclude, the restaurant was closed.
I willwould appreciate it if you could send me my money back. LookingWaiting for your repleyreply.
Unfortunately, Pat was not very good at keeping secrets. That is why she could nonot be a spy.

When she was a girl, Pat used to play spiesspy and detectivesdetective games. Her mother gave her a book about how to become a spy for her birthdayfor her birthday about how to become a spy. She had watched all of Mission Impossible and gadget, the inspector series.
When she finished the school, she went to study toat the Agent TrainningTraining Agency where she learnt about guns, clues, agencies, etc. She was the best student they havehad ever had.

But things changed during her first mission. She was sendedsent to New York to discover how some people from the government gave money to the merchants because they wantwanted to build a Trade CenterCentre there.

At first she walked around the baysidebay-side market, looking forat all the people who were there. When she saw a man, different forfrom the rest, talking with one of the sellerssalesmen. Immediately, immediately she interrupted, she interrupted immediately and told to the man that she was a secret agent. Obviously the man realised that she was looking for him and said that she was really crazy!
You can imagine what had happenedhappened withto her cover as a spy.
